attributes.action: Temporarily close down all work places and public areas till COVID-19 is over.
attributes.additional_details: Financial support by Government, as given by Australia; would be much appreciated under such an epidemic. I believe the UK, has not taken this seriously enough.
attributes.background:
Parliament, should take more action on COVID- 19. Individuals are still interacting  to a degree which is not acceptable. This is a major cause of this virus spreading. 

Individuals who wish to stop working, should be supported by the government.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that everyone should stay at home to prevent the spread of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
